title: Security Self-Assessment
subtitle: Answer a quick questionnaire and get a personalized evaluation

questions.employees: How many employees does your company have?
questions.budget: What is your annual cybersecurity budget?
questions.breaches: Has your company suffered any security breaches in the last 2 years?
questions.backup: Do you have a backup and disaster recovery plan?
questions.awareness: Do you conduct regular security awareness training?
questions.audit: Do you perform regular security audits?
questions.compliance: Are you subject to compliance requirements (HIPAA, PCI, GDPR)?
questions.incident_response: Do you have an incident response plan?
questions.endpoint_protection: Do you have EDR (Endpoint Detection & Response)?
questions.siem: Do you use a SIEM (Security Information and Event Management) system?
questions.vendor_management: Do you have a vendor security management program?
questions.vulnerability_scan: Do you regularly scan for vulnerabilities?
questions.security_team: Do you have a dedicated security team?
questions.incident_history: Have you had a significant security incident in the last 12 months?
questions.zero_trust: Do you implement Zero Trust security model?

result_description: Based on your answers, here is our analysis and recommendations
